alert.note: Alert for Hinds; Issaquena (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 09 at 8:58PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Warren, west central Hinds and southeastern Issaquena Counties through 945 PM CDT... At 858 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Redwood, or 9 miles north of Vicksburg, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Bovina around 915 PM CDT. Flowers around 920 PM CDT. Edwards and Newman around 930 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
